Articles.Content:
Since the forums went all haywire, I cannot seem to find this add-on anymore, could anyone point me to it?

I'm looking for the white/green striped inflatable module
It's not exactly the same as in your picture, but I use this one

It's not exactly the same as in your picture, but I use this one

I have that one on my station I'm looking for the one above in the picture, because it unfolds and inflates, so it has a very small footprint during launch.

I have that one on my station I'm looking for the one above in the picture, because it unfolds and inflates, so it has a very small footprint during launch.
Sounds pretty good. I'll hope someone knows where to get it... Now I want it too.

The part was called Air HAB I think and was by Nhnifong if that will help with searching.

Edit: If you can't find a link to it, MP your Email and I can send you a copy of it.

Edited April 28, 2013 by Tommygun

The part was called Air HAB I think and was by Nhnifong if that will help with searching.

Edit: If you can't find a link to it, MP your Email and I can send you a copy of it.

I can also offer a copy if needed.

I really enjoy the mod, but it's annoying to have to place the damn things with the correct orientation because there's no distinctive markings.

I can also offer a copy if needed.

I really enjoy the mod, but it's annoying to have to place the damn things with the correct orientation because there's no distinctive markings.

I looked all over and couldn't find it. I had it downloaded but it got deleted when I had to do some HD management.
